channel.title: AWS Session Manager on Beachgeek blog - a refuge for pineapple on pizza lovers
channel.description: Recent content in AWS Session Manager on Beachgeek blog - a refuge for pineapple on pizza lovers

item.title: Long running data import jobs with AWS Session Manager
item.description: Yesterday I was looking to import the TPC-H dataset (some 600 or so million rows) into Amazon Aurora from a workstation that I connect to using AWS Session Manager. AWS Session Manager is a great way to simplify your life by allowing you to connect to a machine via the AWS console and not worry about having to manage ssh keys or remembering to lock down external public access from the net.
